name: resubmit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give or offer something for a decision to be made on it by others, when it is not the first time you have done this: He has one more chance to resubmit the proposal. I was advised to resubmit the forms.
More examplesFewer examplesThe company plans to resubmit a licensing application for this product.Any new aid deal will need to be resubmitted to the EU for approval. Matthews' nomination was resubmitted by President James Garfield later that year.
